targets.formattedQuery: SELECT 1 - sum("errorCount")/sum("points") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "testName" =~ /^$profile$/ AND "runId" =~ /^$runid$/ AND "requestName"=~ /(send|block|request)/ AND $timeFilter
targets.query:
SELECT 1 - sum(errors_count) / sum(points_count)
FROM jmresults
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND profile_name = '$profile'
    AND run_id = '$runid'
targets.rawQuery: SELECT 1 - sum(errors_count) / sum(points_count) FROM jmresults WHERE     timestamp_sec >= toDateTime(1544308447)     AND profile_name = ''     AND run_id = ''

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT sum("errorCount")/sum("points") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "testName" =~ /^$profile$/ AND "runId" =~ /^$runid$/ AND "requestName"=~ /(send|block|request)/ AND $timeFilter
targets.query:
SELECT sum(errors_count) / sum(points_count)
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND profile_name = '$profile'
    and run_id = '$runid'
targets.rawQuery: SELECT sum(errors_count) / sum(points_count) FROM default.jmresults WHERE     timestamp_sec >= toDateTime(1544308447)     AND profile_name = ''     and run_id = ''

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    sum(points_count)/$agr as "TPS"
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND profile_name ='$profile' and run_id='$runid'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp_sec), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     sum(points_count)/1 as "TPS" FROM default.jmresults WHERE timestamp_sec >= toDateTime(1544308447) AND profile_name ='' and run_id='' GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    sum(errors_count)/$agr as "EPS"
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND profile_name ='$profile' and run_id='$runid'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp_sec), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     sum(errors_count)/1 as "EPS" FROM default.jmresults WHERE timestamp_sec >= toDateTime(1544308447) AND profile_name ='' and run_id='' GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT sample_label,
       sum(points_count) as "Total",
       count(points_count) as "TotalRecs",
       sum(points_count)/count(points_count) as "Compress",
       avg(average_time)/1000 as "AvgResp",
       min(average_time)/1000 as "MinResp",
       max(average_time)/1000 as "MaxResp",
       quantile(0.9)(average_time) as "90perc",
       quantile(0.95)(average_time) as "95perc",
       quantile(0.97)(average_time) as "97perc",
       quantile(0.99)(average_time) as "99perc",
       sum(errors_count) as "Errors",
       (sum(errors_count)/sum(points_count)) as "ErrorRate"
from jmresults
WHERE  profile_name ='TEST' and run_id='TEST'
GROUP BY sample_label;
targets.query:
SELECT sample_label,
       sum(points_count) as "Total",
       /* count(points_count) as "TotalRecs",
       --sum(points_count)/count(points_count) as "Compress",*/
       avg(average_time)/1000 as "AvgResp",
       min(average_time)/1000 as "MinResp",
       max(average_time)/1000 as "MaxResp",
       quantileTDigest(0.9)(average_time)/1000 as "90perc",
       quantileTDigest(0.95)(average_time)/1000 as "95perc",
       quantileTDigest(0.97)(average_time)/1000 as "97perc",
       quantileTDigest(0.99)(average_time)/1000 as "99perc",
       sum(errors_count) as "Errors",
       (sum(errors_count)/sum(points_count)) as "ErrorRate"
from jmresults
WHERE  $timeFilter AND profile_name ='$profile' and run_id='$runid'
GROUP BY sample_label
targets.rawQuery: SELECT sample_label,        sum(points_count) as "Total",        /* count(points_count) as "TotalRecs",        --sum(points_count)/count(points_count) as "Compress",*/        avg(average_time)/1000 as "AvgResp",        min(average_time)/1000 as "MinResp",        max(average_time)/1000 as "MaxResp",        quantileTDigest(0.9)(average_time)/1000 as "90perc",        quantileTDigest(0.95)(average_time)/1000 as "95perc",        quantileTDigest(0.97)(average_time)/1000 as "97perc",        quantileTDigest(0.99)(average_time)/1000 as "99perc",        sum(errors_count) as "Errors",        (sum(errors_count)/sum(points_count)) as "ErrorRate" from jmresults WHERE  timestamp_sec >= toDateTime(1544308447) AND profile_name ='' and run_id='' GROUP BY sample_label

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT sum("points")/$aggregation FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE  "testName" =~ /^$profile$/ AND "runId" =~ /^$runid$/ AND "requestName" =~ /^$request$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    sum(points_count)/$agr as "TPS"
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND profile_name ='$profile' and run_id='$runid' and sample_label='$request'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp_sec), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     sum(points_count)/1 as "TPS" FROM default.jmresults WHERE timestamp_sec >= toDateTime(1544308447) AND profile_name ='' and run_id='' and sample_label='' GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT mean("responseTime") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE  "testName" =~ /^$profile$/ AND "runId" =~ /^$runid$/ AND "requestName" =~ /^$request$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(average_time) as AVG
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND profile_name ='$profile' and run_id='$runid' and sample_label='$request'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp_sec), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,     avg(average_time) as AVG FROM default.jmresults WHERE timestamp_sec >= toDateTime(1544308447) AND profile_name ='' and run_id='' and sample_label='' GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT percentile("responseTime", 90) FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE  "testName" =~ /^$profile$/ AND "runId" =~ /^$runid$/ AND "requestName" =~ /^$request$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[aggregation]]s) fill(null)
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    quantile(0.9)(average_time) as "90perc"
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND profile_name = '$profile'
    and run_id = '$runid'
    and sample_label = '$request'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
